title: Patient Education Before Cardiac Revascularization Surgery: Project-Based Learning with Contextualized Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic human anatomy and foundational knowledge of cardiovascular diseases
context.additional_context: Includes mobile application prototyping and validation processes using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain core medical terminology related to cardiac revascularization surgery procedures with over 90% accuracy.
Learners apply the pre-surgical preparation process (medication adjustment, dietary management, etc.) three or more times through simulation projects.
Learners analyze user experience (UX) evaluation criteria of mobile applications according to the ERGOLIST checklist and achieve over 80% consistency.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
